Instruction: 'Rinse the brown lentils under cold water.'
Dice the carrot, celery stalk, onion, and garlic cloves.'
In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.'
Add diced onion and garlic to the pot and saute for 2-3 minutes, until softened.'
'Stir in curry powder and cook for another minute.'
Add diced carrot, celery, and rinsed lentils to the pot.'
'Pour vegetable broth into the pot and bring to a boil.'
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 25-30 minutes, or until lentils are tender.'
Stir in coconut milk, salt, and black pepper.'
'Simmer for an additional 5 minutes to heat through.'
